title: PROTIMA | The Elite Wellness Club
shortDescription: A cinematic, editorial-split web experience for a high-end clinical fitness club in Dhaka's elite residential zones.
fullDescription: PROTIMA is an 8-page premium web presence designed for a high-net-worth fitness network in Bangladesh. This project breaks from standard web design by utilizing a 'Cinematic Editorial Split' layout, combining a persistent vertical icon dock with a Z-pattern split content area. The aesthetic mimics a luxury brochure, utilizing Deep Emerald and Champagne Gold to signal prestige. The project is highly localized for the Dhaka market, featuring an 'Executive Valet' protocol, 'Stealth Vanguard' wings for absolute female privacy, and medical-grade H13 HEPA air purification infrastructure as a core metabolism stressor defense. Conversion is driven through exclusive 'Initiation' forms, elite 'Curator Matchmakers,' and functional 'Diagnostic Lab' tools that interpret body metrics through a clinical lens rather than a generic fitness one.
features: Clinical 'Dossier Modal' System for Disciplines and Curators
Interactive 'Sanctuary Node' Switcher for multiple branches
Clinical Diagnostic Lab widgets (BMI, TDEE, Hydration)
Cultural 'Pause Privilege' logic for Ramadan and travel
designUnique: Adopted a 'Cinematic Editorial' philosophy. Features high-contrast typography (Playfair Display) and large-scale imagery with slow-scale hover effects. The design intentionally creates a sense of 'weight' and 'prestige' to distinguish the brand from generic commercial gyms. Empathy is woven into the UX, specifically addressing Dhaka-specific stressors like traffic, air quality, and the need for high-level privacy.
developmentProcess: Developed using a utility-first CSS approach with Tailwind, ensuring a flawless responsive experience on both mobile and desktop. Complex state-management for the scheduling engine and diagnostic widgets was written in Vanilla JS to ensure lightning-fast performance and zero framework bloat. Custom intersection observers were implemented to create the signature slow-reveal storytelling feel.

title: SHOKTI | The Kinetic Grid
shortDescription: A high-end, dashboard-style Bento Box UI for a family-focused gym network in Dhaka.
fullDescription: SHOKTI is an 8-page premium web application designed for a fictional Dhaka-based fitness sanctuary. Breaking away from traditional 'Hero/Navbar' templates, the site utilizes a 'Bento Box' layout where information is compartmentalized into tactile, rounded interactive widgets. This approach reduces cognitive load for older generations while maintaining a sleek, app-like feel for younger audiences. The project is deeply rooted in the Bangladeshi cultural context, featuring a unique 'Pause Protocol' for the holy month of Ramadan, dedicated Namaz (prayer) room callouts with valet parking alerts for Gulshan traffic, and a 'Ladies Only Stealth Wing' managed exclusively by female staff. The platform is built for high conversion with integrated lead generation tools, real-time branch traffic simulations, and functional health diagnostics.
features: Interactive BMI, TDEE, and Hydration Hub Diagnostics
Intent-based Workout Filtering Engine (De-stress, Strength, etc.)
Automated Tariff Toggles (Monthly/Annual) with JS Price Engine
Cultural Pause Protocol System for Ramadan/International Travel
designUnique: Adopted a 'Dashboard First' philosophy. Every section is a self-contained card with high-contrast typography (Outfit font) and generous rounding (`rounded-[3rem]`). Utilized a vibrant 'Energy Red' and 'Bengal Green' palette to evoke power and heritage, intentionally avoiding dark/aggressive gym aesthetics to ensure the space feels welcoming to seniors and beginners.
developmentProcess: Engineered strictly with Vanilla JavaScript and utility-first CSS (Tailwind) to ensure lightning-fast performance across mobile and desktop. Built custom state-management logic for the hub switcher, pricing engine, and health tools, allowing the entire user journey to feel like a seamless SPA (Single Page Application) without the weight of heavy frameworks.

title: MATI | Rooted Fitness & Wellness
shortDescription: An editorial-style, magazine-layout web presence for a gentle, multi-generational wellness sanctuary in Dhaka.
fullDescription: An 8-page complete web ecosystem for MATI, a fictional holistic fitness space in Bangladesh designed to counteract toxic gym culture. This project fundamentally changes traditional web design by abandoning the standard 'top navbar + hero' layout in favor of a fixed editorial sidebar (converting to a sleek bottom-bar on mobile). The color palette is deeply earthy (Terracotta, Forest Green, Sand) and utilizes elegant serif typography (Lora) to establish a calm, magazine-like reading experience. The content is heavily localized, specifically addressing Dhaka traffic context, the 'Deshi Diet' (balancing rice/curry), the importance of Namaz rooms, and private 'Stealth' hours for women. The platform features fully functioning, judgment-free wellness tools and interactive filters for schedules and mentorship profiles.
features: Fixed Editorial Sidebar / Mobile App-like Bottom Navigation
Real-time, aesthetically rendered Daily Rhythm schedule
Smooth vertical Accordion for Cultural Manifestos & FAQs
designUnique: A bold rejection of standard tech/SaaS web templates. The layout feels like a high-end lifestyle book. Elements are spaced generously with soft transitions, thin borders, and drop-cap typography to invoke calmness. Empathy is woven into the UX—calculators do not use harsh medical terms like 'obese', opting instead for gentle prompts like 'Supportive Care Suggested'.
developmentProcess: Built entirely with Vanilla JavaScript and Tailwind CSS, focusing on CSS grid and flexbox to manage the dual-layout (sidebar on desktop vs. bottom-nav on mobile) flawlessly without requiring a heavy frontend framework like React. Complex filtering logic for the schedule and trainer galleries was written from scratch to ensure instant, reload-free interactions.

title: Aarohan Fitness & Wellness
shortDescription: A vibrant, accessible, and culturally aligned wellness brand serving every generation in Dhaka.
fullDescription: An 8-page comprehensive web platform built for a premium family-centric gym in Bangladesh (with branches in Gulshan, Dhanmondi, and Uttara). Moving away from intimidating 'hardcore' gym tropes, Aarohan utilizes a bright, welcoming color palette (Sunrise Orange and Ocean Blue) and generous whitespace to appeal to university students, corporate professionals, and senior citizens alike. The site is deeply localized for the Bangladeshi market, prominently featuring dedicated prayer rooms, female-only 'Stealth Zone' operational hours, Jumu'ah break announcements, and a 'Bangladeshi Plate' nutrition guide. The UI is built for high conversion with sticky navbars, floating WhatsApp integrations, and frictionless free-trial forms.
features: Interactive BMI, TDEE, and Hydration Calculators
Dynamic 'Find Your Match' Trainer Matchmaker Form
Fluid Program & Class Schedule Filtering System
designUnique: Designed with a 'Clarity & Community' philosophy. Uses the highly legible Open Sans for body text paired with the friendly Poppins font for headings. Incorporates soft shadows, rounded borders (`rounded-[2rem]`), and clean layout structures to reduce cognitive load and establish trust, specifically appealing to individuals who might normally feel intimidated by traditional tech-heavy or aggressive gym environments.
developmentProcess: Developed strictly with Vanilla JavaScript and Tailwind CSS to ensure rapid load times and zero dependencies. Built custom logic for complex interactions—such as the generative health calculators and the trainer matchmaking algorithm—allowing users to receive immediate, personalized value without ever needing to reload the page or interact with a backend server.

title: BONDHON | The Wellness Circle
shortDescription: A fluid, organic web experience for a premium community-focused gym network in Dhaka's elite hubs.
fullDescription: BONDHON is an 8-page premium web application designed for a multigenerational fitness brand in Bangladesh. Moving away from rigid grids and traditional headers, this project utilizes an 'Organic Fluidity' philosophy, featuring circular motifs, rounded blobs, and a unique 'Floating Nav Flower' for an immersive, sanctuary-like experience. The platform is deeply localized for the Bangladeshi elite market, addressing the need for hospital-grade H13 HEPA air purification in Dhaka, 'Stealth Vanguard' wings for absolute female privacy, and physiotherapy-led mobility protocols for senior members. Conversion is optimized through interactive 'Vitality Lab' diagnostics, a dynamic 'Guide Matchmaker' tool, and culturally-tuned features like the 'Ramadan Pause Protocol' and 'Deshi Plate' nutritional coaching.
features: Interactive Vitality Lab diagnostics (BMI, TDEE, Hydration)
Cultural 'Pause Protocol' logic for Ramadan and travel
designUnique: Adopted an 'Organic Fluidity' philosophy. Replaced standard navigation bars with a blooming interactive flower. Utilized a soft, high-contrast palette (Sunrise Peach & Healing Mint) with rounded, shifting shapes to create a sense of calm and accessibility. The design intentionally avoids aggressive fitness imagery to welcome seniors and beginners into the 'Circle'.
developmentProcess: Built using utility-first CSS (Tailwind) to ensure a perfectly responsive fluid experience across all devices. Custom Vanilla JS was engineered for complex state management (diagnostic calculators, schedule filtering, and hub transitions) to maintain high performance with zero framework dependencies. Custom intersection observers create a smooth, staggered 'reveal' effect for the organic elements.

title: IRON-NEXUS | Cybernetic Fitness Hub
shortDescription: A cyberpunk-themed, heavily gamified web application for a tech-driven elite gym franchise in Dhaka.
fullDescription: An 8-page web ecosystem designed for a fictional, high-end data-driven fitness hub located in Bangladesh (Gulshan, Banani, Dhanmondi). Instead of a traditional corporate gym layout, the site treats fitness as a video game 'avatar upgrade'. It uses a Cyber-Industrial aesthetic featuring aggressive clip-path geometries, neon cyan/orange glows, scanline overlays, and 'glitch' hover animations. The content is heavily localized for the Dhaka market, introducing specific contextual features like 'The Dhaka Diet Patch' for handling corporate deshi lunches, a 'System Pause Protocol' for Ramadan and travel, and a dedicated 'Stealth Zone' addressing the cultural requirement for a private, female-only training sanctuary.
features: Gamified 'Skill Tree' Navigation for Workout Programs
Live Telemetry Terminal (Hover-responsive JS Stat Bars)
Custom Cyber-Geometric Cursor & Global Scanline Overlay
designUnique: A bold rejection of minimal, soft web design. Utilizes fonts like Orbitron and Rajdhani paired with deep #0B0C10 backgrounds and harsh neon borders. Every UI element mimics a heads-up display (HUD), renaming standard pages like 'About' and 'Trainers' to 'Lore' and 'Vanguard', completely immersing the user in an RPG-like physical upgrade system.
developmentProcess: Developed using strict Vanilla JS constraints (no React/Vue) combined with advanced Tailwind CSS utility classes. Custom CSS was only used for complex clip-paths, cursor rendering, and specific keyframe glitch animations. Built highly interactive, state-managed components (like the schedule grid and the dynamic stat injection on the coaches page) from scratch to ensure immediate reactivity and a lightweight payload.

title: KINETIC | High-Performance Lab
shortDescription: A completely non-traditional, brutalist OS-style website for a data-driven elite gym in Dhaka.
fullDescription: An 8-page avant-garde website built for a fictional high-end biometric gym in Bangladesh (Gulshan, Banani, Dhanmondi). The project deliberately abandons traditional web architecture—removing the top navigation bar entirely in favor of a bottom-floating 'Kinetic Deck' radial menu. Utilizing a 'Neon-Brutalism' aesthetic (Obsidian Black, Acid Green, Electric Violet) and terminal typography, the site feels like interacting with a military-grade operating system. It features raw JS functionality including a custom cyber-cursor, a draggable map UI, functional biometric telemetry tools (TDEE/Macros), and simulated live facility capacity radars to create high urgency.
features: Navbar-less UI via 'The Kinetic Deck' Command Overlay
Simulated Live Network Feeds & Waitlist Tickers
designUnique: A total departure from soft, friendly corporate designs. Uses strict grid backgrounds, sharp unrounded borders with solid drop-shadows (brutalism), and cinematic 'terminal bootloader' sequences on every page load to establish an aggressive, high-performance 'hacker' vibe.
developmentProcess: Engineered exclusively with Vanilla JS and Tailwind utility classes (zero external CSS files). Built complex interactive states—such as the typing-effect modal for Operator dossiers and the mouse-drag scrolling logic for the communications hub—without relying on heavy libraries like React or Swiper.js.

title: AETHER | State of Flow
shortDescription: An avant-garde, sensory-optimized fitness sanctuary website built to induce 'flow state' for Dhaka's corporate elite.
fullDescription: An 8-page highly experimental web application for a luxury, sensory-deprivation fitness center in Bangladesh (Gulshan, Banani, Dhanmondi). This project completely abandons traditional UI patterns (like top navbars and sharp grids). Instead, it utilizes a 'Liquid Glassmorphism' philosophy featuring deep void backgrounds, animated aurora gradients, and frosted-glass panels. The primary navigation is a 'Magnetic Orb' that reacts to the user's cursor. Content is deeply localized, introducing features like 'The Bengal Diet Paradigm' for local corporate lunches, a strict 'Pause Protocol' for Friday Jumu'ah and Ramadan, and a dedicated 'Female-Only Sanctuary' to address cultural privacy needs.
features: Magnetic Orb Navigation System (Replaces Top Navbar)
Interactive 'Flow State Matrix' (JS Sensory Data Visualization)
Fluid Diagnostic Calculators (BMI/TDEE/Macros) with seamless transitions
Cinematic Modals for 'Architects of Flow' (Guide Profiles)
Live Facility Frequency Simulator (Dynamic Capacity Energy Meter)
designUnique: Deliberately anti-traditional. Employs large, elegant typography (Playfair Display) mixed with technical data fonts (Inter) to merge human emotion with clinical science. Elements float and morph using CSS keyframes, while `backdrop-filter: blur` is used extensively to create depth and layering, mimicking a living, breathing digital organism.
developmentProcess: Developed entirely without heavy external frameworks like React or Three.js. The magnetic physics, cursor tracking, dynamic timeline rendering, and complex modal states were all engineered using highly optimized Vanilla JavaScript and Tailwind CSS utility classes, ensuring lightning-fast load times despite the visually heavy UI.

title: Zenith Wellness Hub
shortDescription: A traditional yet modern high-end holistic fitness ecosystem for premium Dhaka demographics.
fullDescription: A comprehensive 9-page website built for Zenith Wellness Hub, a premier holistic fitness center in Bangladesh (Dhanmondi, Gulshan, Uttara). The project departs from aggressive 'hardcore gym' marketing, opting for a 'Modern Holistic' design system featuring a slate-and-mint palette, clean typography (Plus Jakarta Sans), and large high-quality imagery. The site features deeply interactive elements including a dual-filter operational grid (schedule), a suite of clinical health analytics tools (BMI, BMR, Macro engines), and specialized sections for Women's Privacy and Corporate B2B wellness, all powered by optimized Vanilla JavaScript.
designUnique: Utilizes a 'Structured Premium' philosophy that balances traditional navigation with highly interactive content sections. It employs smooth transitions, glassmorphic navigation, and bento-box service layouts to signal trust and high value to corporate professionals and health enthusiasts in Bangladesh.
developmentProcess: Developed with a modular Vanilla JS engine to handle dynamic schedule rendering and biometric calculations without external framework bloat. Integrated local market considerations such as 'Jumuah Observance' and 'Membership Freeze Protocols' directly into the UX to ensure 100% relevance to the Bangladeshi consumer.

title: TITAN FORGE GYM
shortDescription: An industrial, high-intensity gym portfolio targeting powerlifters and combat athletes in Dhaka.
fullDescription: An 8-page raw, industrial-themed website built for an elite combat sports and heavy lifting facility in Bangladesh (Bashundhara R/A & Dhanmondi). The UI abandons soft 'commercial gym' aesthetics in favor of Matte Black, Forged Amber, and Steel Gray, utilizing the aggressive 'Teko' font. The site features highly interactive Vanilla JS elements, including an interactive 'War Room' with algorithms calculating 1-Rep Max and Fight Camp Macros (TDEE), a dual-filter Timetable for managing complex class schedules, and terminal-styled booking modals to maximize lead generation.
features: Interactive War Room Calculators (1RM, TDEE, Hydration)
Dynamic Base Selector for Branch Info
Annual vs Monthly BDT Contract Engine
designUnique: Employs an 'Industrial Grit & Iron' design language characterized by hazard stripes, heavy block shadows (`shadow-[8px_8px_0px_#FFB300]`), terminal-styled input fields, and monochromatic imagery overlaid with deep gradients. The copy heavily leans into military/combat terminology (e.g., 'Commanders' instead of trainers, 'Enlistment' instead of membership) to attract serious athletes.
developmentProcess: Developed with purely functional Vanilla JS to handle dynamic data rendering for schedules and trainer rosters, eliminating the need for heavy frameworks. Built custom logic for health metric algorithms (Epley Formula, Mifflin-St Jeor) directly into the UI, pairing them with simulated 'terminal processing' animations for an immersive user experience.

title: SYNC Fitness Lab
shortDescription: A cyberpunk-inspired, data-driven gym portfolio utilizing glassmorphism and bento-box layouts.
fullDescription: An 8-page highly unconventional fitness website designed for a tech-integrated gym in Dhaka's premier corporate hubs (Banani & Gulshan). Shunning traditional 'hardcore gym' aesthetics, SYNC Fitness Lab utilizes a 'Cyber-Glassmorphism' design language—featuring Deep Space Black, Electric Cyan (`#00E5FF`), Neon Purple, and frosted glass panels. The site treats fitness like a software update ('Bio-hacking', 'Modules', 'System Initialization'). It is engineered for high engagement, replacing the standard hero image with an interactive Bento Grid dashboard featuring a live (simulated) capacity tracker, module countdowns, and quick-access BMI tools.
features: Custom Glowing Cyber Cursor & Progress Scroll
designUnique: Abandons standard typography for `Rajdhani` (headings) and `Orbitron` (data/numbers) to create an immersive 'operating system' feel. It extensively uses CSS `backdrop-filter: blur`, neon box-shadows, and a custom CSS cyber-grid background to mimic a high-tech software interface rather than a physical space.
developmentProcess: Built entirely with Vanilla JS to maintain lightweight performance despite complex UI interactions. Developed custom logic to simulate real-time API fetches (e.g., Live Gym Capacity bar, scrolling matrix text preloader, and auto-updating community feeds) to sell the 'tech-startup' illusion, alongside mathematically accurate health formulas (Mifflin-St Jeor).

title: OXYGEN | The Fitness Reserve
shortDescription: An editorial-style, minimalist brutalist portfolio for a high-end air-purified gym in Dhaka.
fullDescription: An 8-page premium fitness sanctuary website designed for a high-net-worth demographic in Bangladesh (Gulshan & Banani). Shunning traditional navigation, the site utilizes an 'Editorial Minimalist' design language with a floating bottom dock, massive 'Clash Display' typography, and a Deep Forest Green & Bone White palette. The project focuses on the 'Oxygen Reserve' concept, positioning the gym as a clean-air sanctuary using H13 HEPA filtration. It features functional stepped-calculators (TDEE, 1RM), a live capacity-tracking schedule, and editorial-style Master Guide profiles, all powered by lightweight Vanilla JavaScript.
features: Navbar-less UI with Floating Bottom Dock
Stepped Clinical Fitness Calculators (Mifflin-St Jeor & Epley)
designUnique: Adopts a 'Magazine Brutalism' aesthetic—replacing traditional headers with asymmetric layouts and huge display type. The UX is optimized for high-end mobile users, placing all critical navigation within thumb-reach via a floating dock and prioritizing clean, high-contrast imagery with custom slide-reveal masks.
developmentProcess: Engineered without a standard navbar to force focus on high-conversion editorial content. Built a custom Vanilla JS state manager for the dual-hub schedule and interactive metrics tools, ensuring smooth cross-fades and transitions without the bloat of external libraries.

title: FITNEX Arena
shortDescription: High-energy, tech-driven commercial gym website optimized for modern professionals.
fullDescription: An 8-page modern fitness center website designed for a scalable gym franchise in Bangladesh (with branches in Mirpur and Uttara). The design utilizes a high-energy palette of Vibrant Orange and Deep Navy, with 'Montserrat' providing bold, sporty typography. The site is engineered for high conversion rates, featuring a live BMI and TDEE macro calculator to capture leads, an interactive multi-branch schedule filter, dynamic booking modals, and seamless WhatsApp integration. It leverages the local context heavily, offering corporate squad plans for Dhaka tech hubs and addressing the 'Dhaka Diet' (macros around local staples like rice and biryani).
features: Real-Time BMI & TDEE Lead Gen Calculators
Annual vs Monthly BDT Pricing Engine
designUnique: Blends the aesthetic of a high-end commercial gym with the UI/UX of a modern tech startup. Utilizes sharp, slanted clipping paths (`slant-top`, `slant-bottom`) to create dynamic forward momentum on the page, paired with glowing neon drop shadows to emphasize interactive elements.
developmentProcess: Developed a robust Vanilla JavaScript architecture to handle multi-dimensional filtering (e.g., filtering schedules by both Day and Branch simultaneously). Implemented complex health algorithms (Epley Formula for 1RM, Mifflin-St Jeor for BMR) securely on the client side without relying on external UI or math libraries.

title: OXYGEN Wellness & Spa
shortDescription: An ultra-premium, 5-star wellness club website targeting elite clients in Dhaka.
fullDescription: An 8-page ultra-luxury wellness and spa portfolio designed for high-net-worth individuals in Gulshan and Banani, Bangladesh. It shifts away from aggressive gym aesthetics, opting instead for a 'Champagne Gold and Forest Night' color palette with elegant serif typography. The site is highly interactive without feeling cluttered, featuring an intuitive Program Matcher quiz, an interactive Facility Zone navigator, a bespoke BMI/TDEE calculator tailored for the local 'Dhaka Diet', and a high-end application system for memberships and private tours.
designUnique: Utilizes the 'Playfair Display' serif typeface mixed with a custom floating gold cursor to evoke the feeling of a 5-star hotel rather than a traditional gym. Implements extensive scroll-based 'fade-up' animations to ensure a smooth, unhurried browsing experience suitable for a luxury brand.
developmentProcess: Built complex interactive states entirely in Vanilla JS to maintain high performance. Features include a multi-step logic quiz for program recommendations, dynamic pricing toggles that instantly calculate annual savings in BDT, and a sleek image slider built without any heavy external libraries (like Swiper or Slick).

title: IRONCORE Fitness
shortDescription: High-energy, neon brutalist website for a premium gym in Dhaka.
fullDescription: An 8-page premium fitness center website designed for the Bangladeshi market (Banani/Dhanmondi). It features a striking 'Neon Brutalist' aesthetic using deep blacks and neon yellow. The site is highly interactive, featuring a live BMI and BMR macro calculator tailored for local diets, a dynamic class schedule filter, and interactive trainer booking modals. It includes localized context like BDT pricing, Ramadan freezing policies, and corporate squad plans.
designUnique: Utilizes the bold 'Oswald' typeface paired with a high-contrast Neon Volt on Black palette to evoke sweat, energy, and premium exclusivity. High-quality grayscale imagery turns to color on hover to create a highly dynamic user experience.
developmentProcess: Implemented complex JavaScript logic entirely in Vanilla JS without external libraries, including health metric algorithms (Mifflin-St Jeor), Isotope-style DOM filtering for classes and schedules, and smooth interactive states for modals and accordions.

title: Titan X - Mujahid's Portfolio
shortDescription: High-performance dark mode portfolio for a Full Stack Engineer.
fullDescription: An 8-page 'Cyber-Mercenary' style portfolio designed for a computer engineer. It features a deep dark theme with neon cyan/green accents, a terminal-style contact form, and a 'Tech Radar' to showcase skills. The site includes a custom JavaScript engine ('The Brain') that allows the user to update their CV details (Name, Bio, Projects) in one single script block, which then populates the entire website dynamically.
designUnique: Uses a 'System UI' aesthetic with monospace fonts, blinking cursors, and circuit board patterns to appeal to technical recruiters and clients looking for modern web solutions.
developmentProcess: Implemented a centralized data object in vanilla JS to manage content state, simulating a headless CMS experience without any backend dependencies.

title: Nexus - Engineer Portfolio
shortDescription: High-performance dark mode portfolio for a Full Stack Engineer.
fullDescription: A 9-page 'Cyber-Architect' style portfolio designed for Fidbi Hasan. It features a deep dark theme with neon cyan accents, a terminal-style contact form, and a 'Tech Matrix' to showcase full-stack skills. The design mimics a developer's command center with code snippets and system diagnostics.
designUnique: Uses a 'System UI' aesthetic with monospace fonts, blinking cursors, and circuit board patterns to appeal to technical recruiters and clients looking for robust backend solutions.
developmentProcess: Implemented a 'Kernel' data object in vanilla JS to manage content state, allowing for easy updates to the CV data without touching the HTML structure.

title: Aurora - HCI Portfolio
shortDescription: Aesthetic glassmorphism portfolio for UI/UX & HCI researchers.
fullDescription: A 9-page 'Soft UI' portfolio designed for Asmaul Husna Mayad. It features a custom interactive cursor, a masonry gallery for Dribbble shots, and a dedicated 'Research' page for academic papers. The design uses pastel gradients and frosted glass effects to reflect empathy and modern design principles.
designUnique: Moves away from the typical 'dark mode' developer aesthetic to a light, airy, and human-centric design that aligns with HCI principles.
developmentProcess: Implemented a custom cursor logic in vanilla JS and a CSS-only masonry grid for the gallery page to ensure high performance and smooth animations.

title: Nova Strategy
shortDescription: Clean, trust-focused portfolio for B2B & corporate clients.
fullDescription: A 7-page 'Clean Corporate' website designed for high-end B2B clients in Bangladesh. It features a transparent pricing model, a project cost estimator, and a formal 'Company Profile' page, utilizing a 'Trust Blue & Slate Gray' palette to signal stability.
designUnique: Adopted a 'Clarity & Growth' philosophy with generous whitespace, the Plus Jakarta Sans typeface, and a restrained color palette to appeal to corporate decision-makers (Banks, Real Estate, FMCG).
developmentProcess: Built a custom tab-switching logic for the services page and a dynamic budget calculator in vanilla JS to provide immediate value to potential leads without page reloads.

title: Elevate Global
shortDescription: Executive dark-mode portfolio for premium education consultancy.
fullDescription: A 7-page 'Private Banking' style website designed for the affluent education market in Bangladesh. It features a 'Slate & Gold' aesthetic, sophisticated serif typography, and a high-touch user experience. The site emphasizes exclusivity, financial precision ('Financial Forensics'), and end-to-end concierge services for students targeting Ivy League and Russell Group universities.
designUnique: Abandons the typical 'colorful/friendly' student vibe for a serious, high-contrast 'Executive' look that appeals to parents making significant financial investments.
developmentProcess: Implemented a custom multi-step form logic with validation and a 'Vault' concept for data privacy to build trust with high-net-worth clients.

title: Astra Overseas
shortDescription: Dark-mode, futuristic consultancy portfolio for elite students.
fullDescription: A 7-page 'Premium Dark Mode' website designed for the high-end education market in Bangladesh. It features a 'Deep Space' aesthetic with neon cyan/purple accents, glassmorphism, and holographic UI elements. The site positions the agency as a 'Career Architect' rather than a simple file processor, utilizing advanced features like a 'Visa Lab' financial audit showcase and an AI-styled eligibility wizard.
designUnique: Breaks the mold of traditional 'blue/white' education sites by adopting a 'Cyberpunk/Fintech' look that appeals to ambitious, tech-savvy Gen Z students and affluent parents.
developmentProcess: Implemented complex CSS animations for 'glowing' borders and 'floating' cards, along with a vanilla JS multi-step form logic that simulates a system data processing interface.

title: Pathway Global
shortDescription: Vibrant, student-centric portfolio for a study abroad agency.
fullDescription: A 7-page 'EdTech Lifestyle' website designed to convert students into applicants. It features a high-energy Teal & Orange palette, a 'University Finder' search engine, and a gamified 'Free Assessment' wizard. The design focuses on social proof through a 'Visa Gallery' and video testimonials, addressing specific local needs like IELTS waivers and study gap acceptance.
designUnique: Uses a 'Launchpad' aesthetic with pill-shaped buttons, card-based layouts, and cheerful typography to reduce the stress of the application process for Gen Z users.
developmentProcess: Built a custom multi-step form handler in vanilla JS to guide users through the assessment process, increasing lead quality by gathering detailed profile data before submission.

title: Empire Legal: Advocates & Solicitors
shortDescription: A 'Sovereign Red & Ivory' high-end digital headquarters for Bangladesh's top-tier legal practitioners.
fullDescription: Empire Legal is a benchmark 8-page digital ecosystem designed for the elite echelon of the Bangladeshi legal market. Moving away from standard minimalist or dark themes, this project utilizes a 'Sovereign Red & Ivory' palette to signal institutional history, unyielding authority, and transparency. The site functions as a comprehensive operational hub, featuring a multi-step appointment engine that pre-vetts cases, an interactive Reported Judgment archive with procedural strategy breakdowns, and a live-searchable legislative repository. Built on a zero-dependency pure Vanilla stack (HTML5/Tailwind/JS), it achieves extreme performance scores on local mobile networks while providing high-resolution visual polish. From the forensic case-merit calculator to the sepia-toned interactive HQ mapping, every element is meticulously engineered to position the firm as the primary sovereign authority for Multinational Corporations and High-Net-Worth Individuals.
features: Algorithmic Case-Merit Tool: A custom-built calculator that provides an immediate diagnostic percentage for legal standing based on area and evidence readiness.
Smart Multi-Step Booking Engine: A dynamic form that toggles fields for corporate vs. individual needs, ensuring high pre-consultation lead quality.
Reported Judgment Archive: An interactive accordion-based vault breaking down complex High Court wins into 'Challenge' vs. 'Tactical Strategy'.
Live Intel Repository: A real-time client-side search engine for legal articles, allowing users to find specific gazetted updates (e.g., Bank Company Act).
Emergency Defense Ribbon: A high-visibility, persistent UI element providing one-touch access to a 24/7 criminal defense and bail hotline.
designUnique: The design follows a 'Institutional Mastery' philosophy. We abandoned standard blue/white law templates for a warm 'Ivory White' background punctuated by 'Sovereign Red' (#991b1b) accents. This combination projects expensive, historic authority without the coldness of dark themes. Custom grayscale-to-color image transitions and 'Cinzel' serif typography evoke a sense of European scholarly rigor applied to the Bangladeshi legal context.
developmentProcess: Developed using a 'Modular Component' approach in pure Vanilla JS. We engineered custom logic for the multi-step intake form and the post-filtering search engine to maintain a lightweight footprint (under 14KB JS). The layout was specifically stress-tested for 'Dhaka Traffic Readability'—ensuring large touch targets and high-contrast text for clients accessing legal updates while in transit.

title: TITAN LEGAL: Barristers & Advocates
shortDescription: A powerful 'Crimson & Steel' themed digital presence for Bangladesh's top-tier legal chambers.
fullDescription: TITAN LEGAL is an 8-page, 100+ section digital ecosystem engineered for the elite echelon of the Bangladeshi legal market. Moving away from standard minimalist designs, this project utilizes a 'Corporate Power' aesthetic—combining Deep Navy and Cardinal Red—to project absolute authority, urgency, and institutional history. The site functions as a virtual command center, featuring a multi-path appointment engine for individual and corporate entities, a high-impact case results archive with procedural strategy breakdowns, and a live-searchable legal intelligence library. Built on a pure Vanilla stack (HTML5/Tailwind/JS), it ensures zero-latency performance on local 4G networks while maintaining military-grade visual polish. Every interaction, from the marquee hiring ribbons to the sepia-toned interactive maps, is meticulously crafted to signal that this is the firm corporations hire when they cannot afford to lose.
features: Smart Multi-Path Booking Engine: Dynamically toggles fields for Individual vs. Corporate clients to maximize intake conversion rates.
Procedural Verdict Archive: An interactive 'Verdicts' page that breaks complex judgments into 'Challenge' vs. 'Strategy' accordions for evidence-based trust.
Live Intel Hub: A real-time client-side search engine for the legal blog, allowing stakeholders to instantly find analyses of specific Acts (e.g., Bank Company Act).
Emergency Rapid Response Banner: A persistent, high-visibility UI element providing 24/7 access to urgent criminal defense and bail support.
Dynamic Bio-Modal System: An immersive overlay for attorney profiles that highlights academic pedigree and Supreme Court seniority without page reloads.
designUnique: The design philosophy is 'Institutional Aggression.' We abandoned the common blue/white law firm template for a 'Crimson & Steel' palette. Cardinal Red (#b91c1c) is used as a tactical accent to guide the user's eye to high-conversion actions, while 'Oswald' typography provides a bold, newspaper-like authority. New, high-resolution grayscale imagery was curated to contrast against the red accents, creating a high-stakes, cinematic legal atmosphere.
developmentProcess: Developed using a 'Modular Vanilla' architecture. We built custom JavaScript modules for the filtering systems and form logic to maintain a lightweight footprint (under 12KB JS). The layout was stress-tested for mobile responsiveness in the Dhaka High Court vicinity, ensuring rapid document access despite local network throttling. Semantic HTML5 ensures 95+ scores on SEO and accessibility audits.

title: Justice Chambers
shortDescription: Prestigious, authoritative portfolio for a top-tier law firm.
fullDescription: A 7-page 'Gilded Slate' website designed for a premier Bangladeshi law firm. It communicates authority through a Deep Navy & Gold palette, Serif typography, and specific features like a 'Case Verdict Archive', 'Attorney Profiles' with modal bios, and a downloadable 'Legal Resource' center.
designUnique: Utilizes a 'Gilded Slate' aesthetic with Playfair Display (Serif) fonts and Gold accents to evoke a sense of history, trust, and elite capability suitable for High Court advocates.
developmentProcess: Implemented a vanilla JS intersection observer for the history timeline animation and a sticky sidebar scroll-spy to handle dense legal information easily.

title: Legal Nexus & Associates
shortDescription: A prestigious, high-conversion digital headquarters for a top-tier Bangladeshi Law Chamber.
fullDescription: Legal Nexus is a comprehensive 9-page digital ecosystem engineered specifically for the Bangladeshi legal landscape. Recognizing that trust is the primary currency in law, the site utilizes a 'Trust Blue & Slate Gray' palette, reinforced by professional gold accents to signify authority. The architecture includes specialized pages for 'Practice Areas', 'Land Dispute Expertise', 'Corporate Law', and a dedicated 'Supreme Court Case Tracker' interface. To drive conversions, we integrated a custom-built Vanilla JS 'Legal Fee Estimator' and an interactive 'Consultation Booking System'. The design balances the gravity of legal services with modern UI trends, ensuring a seamless experience for both local corporate entities and international clients seeking legal representation in Bangladesh.
features: Dynamic Legal Fee Estimator: A JS-powered tool to give clients instant ballpark figures.
Integrated Appointment Scheduler: A multi-step functional form with real-time validation.
Practice Area Accordions: Clean, space-saving data organization for complex legal services.
Interactive Case Study Timeline: Showcasing the firm's history of successful litigation.
Responsive Multi-level Navigation: Optimized for the high mobile-user density in Bangladesh.
Bilingual Support Ready: Structured to easily toggle between English and Bengali legal terms.
designUnique: The 'Seal of Trust' philosophy was applied, utilizing high-density whitespace and a structured grid system. We selected the Plus Jakarta Sans typeface for its modern yet formal readability. The color psychology focuses on Deep Navy to establish immediate credibility, paired with Slate Gray for a sophisticated corporate feel, catering specifically to the decision-making process of Bangladeshi MDs and CEOs.
developmentProcess: The development followed a modular 'Component-First' approach in Vanilla JS. We engineered a custom state-management script for the multi-section services page, allowing users to filter practice areas without a single page reload. Every interactive element, from the sticky header logic to the complex footer mapping, was hand-coded to ensure 0% bug rates and lightning-fast load times on 4G networks common in Bangladesh.

title: Vertex Chambers & Partners
shortDescription: A sovereign, authoritative digital presence for a top-tier Bangladeshi law firm.
fullDescription: Vertex Chambers is an 8-page, high-density website engineered to establish immediate institutional trust. Moving away from generic corporate designs, this project adopts a 'Justice Navy & Sovereign Gold' palette (`#0f172a` & `#b45309`) to reflect the gravity of the legal profession in Bangladesh. The site acts as a functional digital office, featuring a dynamic legal service filter, a real-time blog search for legal precedents, and a smart appointment booking system. Content is deeply localized, referencing specific Bangladeshi courts (Artha Rin Adalat, High Court Division) and regulatory bodies (RJSC, BIDA), ensuring it resonates with local corporate clients and individuals seeking serious counsel. The architecture prioritizes speed and clarity, utilizing Vanilla JS for all interactive elements to ensure seamless performance on mobile networks across Dhaka and Chittagong.
features: Smart Legal Service Filter: A JS-powered sorting engine allowing clients to instantly toggle between Corporate, Criminal, and Civil law services.
Interactive Case Study Accordion: A 'Verdicts' section that reveals complex legal strategies and court outcomes without cluttering the UI.
Real-Time Legal Blog Search: An instant-search feature for the 'Insights' page, helping users find articles on specific acts (e.g., 'Land Law', 'Divorce').
Dynamic Booking Form: An appointment system that adapts its fields based on the selected legal area (e.g., asking for 'Company Name' only for Corporate clients).
Attorney Profile Modals: A streamlined team section that opens detailed biographies in a modal overlay, keeping users on the main page.
designUnique: The design philosophy is 'Statutory Authority.' We utilized the Cinzel typeface for headings to evoke the feel of engraved legal stationery, paired with Inter for modern readability. The 'Navy & Gold' theme was chosen to subconsciously signal 'Stability' and 'Excellence' to the Bangladeshi market, avoiding the 'startup' feel of bright colors.
developmentProcess: Developed with a 'Component-First' mindset using Vanilla JS. We built reusable logic for the modals, tabs, and accordions to keep the codebase lightweight (<15kb JS). The site is fully responsive, optimized for 4G mobile data, and follows strict semantic HTML guidelines for SEO ranking on terms like 'Law Firm Dhaka' and 'Supreme Court Lawyer'.

title: Lexicon Chambers & Partners
shortDescription: A digitally engineered fortress of legal authority for a premier Bangladeshi law firm.
fullDescription: Lexicon Chambers is an 8-page, 100+ section digital ecosystem designed to translate the weight and prestige of a traditional law firm into the digital age. Unlike generic templates, this project captures the 'Statutory Heritage' aesthetic required by high-end Bangladeshi advocates. It utilizes a 'Charcoal & Antique Gold' palette to signify stability and features a 'Merriweather' serif typography to evoke the feel of legal deeds. The site functions as a fully operational digital clerk: it includes a smart booking system that distinguishes between corporate and individual clients, a searchable library of Bangladeshi legal precedents, and an interactive map system guiding clients to their Motijheel headquarters. Built entirely on a Vanilla stack (HTML5/Tailwind/JS), it ensures lightning-fast load times even on mobile data networks in Dhaka courts, providing zero-latency access to bail numbers and case records.
features: Smart Booking Engine: A dynamic form that alters input fields based on client type (Corporate vs. Individual), reducing administrative friction.
Precedent Accordion: An interactive case result system that organizes complex High Court judgments into readable 'Challenge vs. Strategy' toggles.
Live Search Library: A real-time filtering system for the legal blog, allowing users to instantly find articles on specific acts (e.g., 'Land Law', 'Divorce').
Dual-Location Mapping: A tabbed interface allowing clients to switch views between the Head Chamber in Motijheel and the Supreme Court branch.
Emergency Bail Ribbon: A contextual UI element providing immediate access to 24/7 criminal defense support, critical for the local market.
designUnique: The design philosophy is 'Statutory Heritage.' We rejected modern minimalism for a 'Dense & Authoritative' layout. Textures of wood and parchment were subtly integrated using CSS overlays. The UI emphasizes hierarchy through heavy serif headings and gold accent lines, subconsciously signaling to the user that this firm has a history of winning in the Appellate Division.
developmentProcess: The project followed a 'Component-Based' Vanilla approach. We created reusable JS functions for modals, tabs, and accordions to keep the script weight under 15kb. Special attention was paid to the 'Print Styles' of the blog pages, ensuring legal articles could be printed cleanly for court reference. The entire site is valid HTML5 and scores 98/100 on Google Lighthouse for Performance and Accessibility.

title: Heritage & Nexus Law Chamber
shortDescription: A warm, high-end digital headquarters for a premier law chamber in Bangladesh.
fullDescription: The Heritage & Nexus Chamber website is a meticulously engineered 8-page digital ecosystem designed to reflect the prestige, tradition, and authority required by the Bangladeshi legal sector. Recognizing that legal decisions in Bangladesh are deeply rooted in trust and seniority, we abandoned the cold, generic corporate blue for a 'Rich Mahogany & Parchment' theme. This palette evokes the atmosphere of a historic Supreme Court library, instilling immediate confidence in potential clients. The platform serves as both a portfolio and a high-conversion tool, featuring custom-built interactive elements like a Legal Fee Estimator, dynamic Practice Area filters, and an automated Consultation Booking System. Every line of code is written in Vanilla JS to ensure lightning-fast performance even on limited mobile data connections, while the content is deeply localized to address specific Bangladeshi legal bodies such as RJSC, BIDA, and the Anti-Corruption Commission. The result is a website that doesn't just display services, but builds a bridge of empathy and expertise between the advocate and the seeker of justice.
features: Interactive Legal Fee Estimator: A JS-powered budget tool that provides preliminary BDT estimates for various case types.
Dynamic Practice Area Filter: An instant-sort UI that allows users to toggle between Civil, Criminal, and Corporate law without page reloads.
Judgment Detail Accordions: A space-saving UI for the Case Results page that breaks down complex legal strategies and outcomes.
High-Conversion Booking System: A multi-step consultation funnel with real-time success state feedback.
Mobile-First Responsive Navigation: A persistsent navbar optimized for the heavy mobile-user demographic in Dhaka and Chittagong.
Knowledge Base Integration: A blog/resource section tailored to local land law and regulatory compliance.
designUnique: We adopted a 'Heritage & Prestige' philosophy. This involved a dual-font strategy: Playfair Display (Serif) for headlines to signal judicial authority, and Lato (Sans-serif) for body text to ensure modern readability. The color psychology utilizes #3d2b1f (Walnut) to ground the design in tradition, #c5a059 (Gold) to signify excellence, and #fdfbf7 (Parchment) to avoid the clinical feel of pure white, making the long legal descriptions easier on the eyes.
developmentProcess: Built entirely within the Vanilla ecosystem to maintain 100% control over the DOM and performance. We utilized Tailwind's utility-first classes to avoid external CSS bloat and implemented custom JS event listeners for the navigation and filtering logic. The project was developed iteratively, starting with a 12-section homepage designed for maximum social proof, followed by specialized pages that address the specific pain points of the Bangladeshi legal market, ensuring zero-bug functionality and a perfect lighthouse performance score.

title: IronClad Chambers: Barristers & Advocates
shortDescription: A formidable, dark-themed digital fortress for an elite Bangladeshi law firm.
fullDescription: IronClad Chambers represents the pinnacle of legal authority in Bangladesh. Departing from traditional light themes, this project embraces an 'Obsidian & Gold' aesthetic to signal exclusivity, power, and high-stakes defense. The 8-page ecosystem is engineered for high-net-worth individuals and corporate entities who require absolute discretion and aggressive representation. It features a bespoke 'Dark Mode' interface with gold accents, a dynamic legal service filter, and a secure consultation booking engine. Every interaction, from the hover effects to the case study accordions, is designed to reinforce the firm's reputation as a tactical legal unit based in Gulshan. The technical stack prioritizes speed and security, utilizing lightweight Vanilla JS and semantic HTML5 to ensure optimal performance on Dhaka's mobile networks.
features: Smart Booking Engine: A dual-path consultation form that adapts for Corporate vs. Individual clients, capturing relevant data like Trade License numbers.
Interactive Case Archive: A 'Victories' page featuring an accordion-style breakdown of complex legal strategies used in the High Court Division.
Real-Time Legal Intel Search: A client-side search engine for the blog, allowing users to instantly find analysis on specific acts (e.g., Digital Security Act).
Emergency Bail Ticker: A persistent UI element providing immediate access to 24/7 criminal defense support.
Attorney Bio Modals: An immersive overlay system for partner profiles, keeping users engaged without navigating away from the team page.
designUnique: The design philosophy is 'Obsidian Authority.' We utilized a deep black and charcoal palette (`#050505` & `#121212`) to create a sense of depth and seriousness. Metallic gold accents (`#D4AF37`) are used sparingly to guide the eye to conversion points. The typography pairs 'Cinzel' (Serif) for headings to evoke statutory weight, with 'Manrope' (Sans) for modern readability.
developmentProcess: Built with a 'Component-First' Vanilla approach. We engineered custom JS functions for the mobile navigation, tab switching, and modal logic to maintain zero dependencies. The site is optimized for local Bangladeshi internet speeds, with lazy-loading images and a grayscale map filter to reduce visual noise. Accessibility standards (ARIA labels) were implemented for all interactive elements.

title: Vantage Legal: Barristers & Solicitors
shortDescription: A sleek, dark-themed digital fortress for a modern Bangladeshi law firm.
fullDescription: Vantage Legal is an 8-page, high-performance website designed to redefine the digital presence of legal professionals in Bangladesh. Moving away from traditional white-and-blue layouts, this project employs a 'Midnight Slate & Copper' palette to signify modern authority, luxury, and aggressive representation. It is engineered for high-net-worth individuals and corporate entities, featuring a smart consultation engine that adapts to client types, a searchable library of Bangladeshi legal precedents, and an interactive case archive. The site utilizes a 'Glassmorphism' dark mode aesthetic with high-contrast typography (Playfair Display & Outfit) to ensure readability while maintaining a cinematic feel. Fully responsive and built on a lightweight Vanilla JS stack, it ensures rapid loading even on mobile data networks across Dhaka.
techStack: Google Maps Embed API (Inverted Dark Mode)
features: Smart Consultation Engine: A dynamic booking form that toggles fields for Corporate vs. Individual clients, capturing specific data like Trade License numbers.
Interactive Case Archive: A 'Victories' page with an accordion-style breakdown of complex legal strategies used in the High Court Division.
Real-Time Legal Intel Search: A client-side search engine for the blog, allowing users to instantly find analysis on specific acts (e.g., Digital Security Act).
Emergency Bail Ticker: A persistent UI element providing immediate access to 24/7 criminal defense support.
Attorney Bio Modals: An immersive overlay system for partner profiles, keeping users engaged without navigating away from the team page.
designUnique: The design philosophy is 'Midnight Authority.' We utilized a palette of deep slate (`#0f172a`) and obsidian (`#020617`) to create depth, punctuated by metallic copper accents (`#b45309`) to guide user attention. This dark theme breaks the mold of traditional law firm sites, positioning Vantage Legal as a forward-thinking, formidable entity. New, high-resolution Unsplash imagery was curated to match this moody, high-stakes aesthetic.
developmentProcess: Built with a 'Component-First' Vanilla approach. We engineered custom JS functions for the mobile navigation, tab switching, and modal logic to maintain zero dependencies. The site is optimized for local Bangladeshi internet speeds, with lazy-loading images and a custom CSS filter for the map to match the dark theme perfectly. Accessibility standards were maintained despite the high-contrast dark mode.

title: Pathfinder Global
shortDescription: Lead-conversion engine for study abroad aspirants.
fullDescription: A high-performance recruitment portal for international students. It features a split-hero layout with a floating lead form and a dynamic partner university logo marquee for instant credibility.
designUnique: Utilized a 'Professional Blue' palette with sharp, corporate edges to convey trust and academic reliability.
developmentProcess: Implemented asynchronous loading for the university marquee to ensure zero impact on page load speed.

title: Vortex Digital
shortDescription: Cyber-industrial portfolio for a high-performance ad agency.
fullDescription: An 8-page 'Cyber-Industrial' agency website designed for high-growth Bangladeshi brands. Features a command-center aesthetic with glitch effects, live ROI calculators, and a tactical service matrix, wrapped in a 'Deep Carbon & Neon Lime' dark mode.
designUnique: Utilized a 'Deep Carbon' (#09090b) background with 'Neon Lime' (#ccff00) accents, featuring a custom cursor and monospaced typography to simulate a high-tech tactical interface.
developmentProcess: Implemented vanilla JS for the complex 'Budget Allocator' logic and used the HTML5 Canvas API for the 'Matrix Rain' effect to ensure high performance without heavy libraries.

title: Synapse Systems
shortDescription: Algorithmic marketing portfolio with SaaS-style architecture.
fullDescription: An 8-page 'Quantum Tech' agency website designed to look like a high-end software dashboard. It features a developer-docs style resource hub, a 'Tech Radar' visualization, and a 'Resource Allocator' calculator, wrapped in a 'Midnight Navy & Plasma Blue' aesthetic.
designUnique: Adopted a 'Digital Grid' philosophy using JetBrains Mono typography, glassmorphism panels, and a reactive background grid to appeal to tech-savvy founders.
developmentProcess: Engineered a custom 'ScrollSpy' navigation for the services page and a vanilla JS 'Torch' effect to simulate a dynamic lighting system on the grid background.

title: Lumina Creative
shortDescription: Vibrant, artistic portfolio for a high-energy creative agency.
fullDescription: An 8-page 'Prismatic Pop' agency website designed to stand out in the Bangladeshi market. Features include a chameleon background that shifts colors, a masonry grid portfolio, and a 'Vibe Meter' for team culture, all wrapped in a 'Royal Purple & Solar Orange' aesthetic.
designUnique: Utilized a 'Prismatic Pop' philosophy with deep purple backgrounds and vibrant gradients (Solar Orange, Laser Pink) to convey high energy and artistic flair.
developmentProcess: Implemented a vanilla JS scroll listener to dynamically change the background gradient based on the active section, creating an immersive 'chameleon' effect without heavy libraries.

title: Nexus Growth Agency
shortDescription: High-performance digital agency portfolio with ROI tools.
fullDescription: A 7-page 'Neo-Minimalist' agency website designed for the Bangladeshi market. Features include an interactive service ecosystem, real-time ad budget ROI calculator, and a dynamic case study filtering system, all wrapped in a 'Frost & Indigo' glassmorphism aesthetic.
designUnique: Utilized a 'Neo-Minimalist' philosophy with Frost White backgrounds and Indigo accents (#4f46e5) to signal high-tech performance and data precision.
developmentProcess: Built custom vanilla JS modules for the pricing toggles and ROI logic to ensure instant interactivity without heavy framework overhead.

title: ScholarGate
shortDescription: Information-rich university exploration dashboard.
fullDescription: Demo 2 focuses on data density. It provides detailed country guides and an interactive university search bar, designed for students in the deep research phase of their application.
designUnique: Academic minimalist style using 'Scholar Gold' accents on a crisp, bright layout for readability.
developmentProcess: Created a lightweight JavaScript object-search to filter through country categories instantly.

title: VisaBridge
shortDescription: Logistics hub for visa processing and document vetting.
fullDescription: This portal simplifies the complex document chain required for global visas. It features interactive roadmaps, document checklists, and embassy interview resources.
designUnique: Instructional design style using 'Safety Teal' to reduce student anxiety throughout the legal process.
developmentProcess: Developed a custom accordion system in vanilla JS to manage heavy information without vertical clutter.

title: GlobalLife Student Hub
shortDescription: Community-focused pre-departure portal.
fullDescription: Demo 4 focuses on student lifestyle after landing. It covers student alumni networks, job hunting tips, and accommodation search in a vibrant, community-first layout.
designUnique: Vibrant and energetic design using rounded corners and warm gradients to appeal to the Gen-Z demographic.
developmentProcess: Optimized mobile navigation for a 'one-thumb' user experience, prioritizing instant social connectivity.

title: Traffic Matrix
shortDescription: Neo-Brutalist, high-contrast portfolio for a performance marketing agency.
fullDescription: A 7-page 'Neo-Brutalist' website that rejects modern design trends for a raw, high-conversion aesthetic. Featuring sharp borders, high-contrast colors (Yellow/Black), and utilitarian interactions, it is designed for agencies that focus purely on ROI and Sales data.
designUnique: Utilizes a 'Anti-Design' philosophy with 0px border radius, thick 3px outlines, and hard shadows to convey a 'no-nonsense' approach to business.
developmentProcess: Implemented vanilla JS for raw, snappy tab switching and a typewriter effect for form submission to mimic a command-line interface.

title: Canvas Real Estate
shortDescription: Art-gallery inspired property marketplace.
fullDescription: Canvas treats every home as a masterpiece. It uses high whitespace and oversized typography to create a sophisticated architectural feel.
designUnique: Blank slate philosophy: Pure white backgrounds with charcoal typography to let property photos dominate.
developmentProcess: Utilized advanced CSS grid systems to create a non-uniform masonry layout for visually striking previews.

title: UrbanAddress
shortDescription: Connectivity-first urban search engine.
fullDescription: Focused on the practicalities of Dhaka living, UrbanAddress highlights metro rail access, commute efficiency, and neighborhood safety rankings.
designUnique: Corporate efficiency design using 'Transit Blue' and high-readability sans-serif fonts.
developmentProcess: Built a JavaScript sorting engine that prioritizes listings based on coordinate proximity to business hubs.

title: Vista Properties
shortDescription: Scenic and panoramic property showcase.
fullDescription: Vista focuses on the 'View-First' experience. It prioritizes penthouses, lake-facing units, and high-rise panoramic apartments with an immersive UI.
designUnique: Immersive frameless design where every image stretches the full width of the browser.
developmentProcess: Applied CSS aspect-ratio hacks to maintain panoramic scale across mobile and desktop screens.

title: Greenleaf Estate
shortDescription: Sustainable and eco-conscious housing portal.
fullDescription: The green-standard for real estate in Bangladesh. It emphasizes energy efficiency, vertical gardens, and LEED-certified building standards.
designUnique: Organic Modernism using a palette of Sage Green, Charcoal, and Off-White.
developmentProcess: Created a custom 'Eco-Meter' JS logic that visualizes long-term utility savings per property.

title: Nexus Real Estate
shortDescription: Smart-home and tech-ready living portal.
fullDescription: Nexus targets tech-savvy professionals. Listings focus on IoT readiness, fiber optics, and automated building management systems.
designUnique: High-tech aesthetic with sharp edges, deep grays, and neon-emerald accents.
developmentProcess: Built an interactive 'Smart-Feature' toggle that changes floorplan visuals to show gadget placement.

title: Urban Elite
shortDescription: Luxury villa and gated community portal.
fullDescription: Urban Elite focuses on horizontal living: private villas, duplexi, and secured gated estates with high-level amenity analysis.
designUnique: Prestigious Navy-and-Gold color scheme with large, elegant serif typography.
developmentProcess: Coded a 'Gated' content section that requires lead-capture to view specific community map details.

title: Nogor Real Estate
shortDescription: Affordable housing and apartment hub.
fullDescription: Focused on the middle-income segment in Uttara, Mirpur, and Bashundhara. Prioritizes bank-loan projects and easy installment plans.
designUnique: Warm, approachable UI using local cultural tones and high-readability layout.
developmentProcess: Implemented a simplified mortgage calculator using a 'Single-Field' entry for mass-market accessibility.

title: Legacy Holding
shortDescription: Trust-centric corporate real estate portal.
fullDescription: A platform for long-term investors. It focuses on freehold land and heritage properties with massive appreciation potential and clean titles.
designUnique: Stable corporate aesthetic with heavy borders and emerald tones to convey permanent value.
developmentProcess: Built a specialized 'Audit Timeline' that shows the legal progress of properties in real-time.

title: Brick & Beams
shortDescription: Technical and structural project showcase.
fullDescription: Focused on construction quality. It provides deep-dives into materials used, beam strength, and finish standards for engineering-conscious buyers.
designUnique: Blueprint-inspired UI with grid-line backgrounds and technical monospaced fonts.
developmentProcess: Developed a custom vanilla JS slider to visualize the layering of building finishes (Raw to Ready).

title: MetroSpace
shortDescription: Dhaka Metro Rail-centric property portal.
fullDescription: Capitalizing on the new transit infrastructure. MetroSpace helps users find properties within walking distance of any Metro station.
designUnique: Modern transit-style UI with 'Signal Green' highlights and fast-paced layout.
developmentProcess: Scripted a coordinate-based logic that calculates walking time between listings and the nearest MRT exit.

title: Onyx Realty
shortDescription: Elite dark-mode penthouse portal.
fullDescription: A boutique agency portal for the top 1% of the market. Onyx focuses on bespoke penthouses, private elevators, and diplomatic zone listings.
designUnique: Bold black-on-black aesthetic with 'Onyx Gold' highlights and deep drop-shadows.
developmentProcess: Used the Intersection Observer API to create a cinematic 'fade-and-scale' reveal for property headers.

title: Urban Void
shortDescription: Avant-garde minimalist dark-mode real estate.
fullDescription: The pinnacle of dark luxury. Urban Void uses 'Negative Space' as a primary element, making property photography feel curated and elite.
designUnique: Pure Zinc-950 background with Electric Cyan accents. Minimalist text, high-impact visuals.
developmentProcess: Developed a custom BDT calculation engine for registration fees based on current government tax SROs.

title: Zenith Estates
shortDescription: Light-minimalist luxury life-style portal.
fullDescription: Zenith focuses on 'Organic Luxury'. It features high-trust legal vetting, a sand-and-terracotta palette, and sophisticated editorial guides.
designUnique: Editorial magazine layout using warm natural tones and high-end serif typography.
developmentProcess: Implemented a scroll-based construction progress visualizer using pure CSS transitions and JS observers.

title: Aura Realty
shortDescription: Organic modernism in property management.
fullDescription: Aura Realty blends urban life with nature. Designed for modern buyers who prioritize eco-ethics, clean aesthetics, and sustainable luxury.
designUnique: Utilizes large 60px border-radii, forest green accents, and a pearl-white backdrop.
developmentProcess: Scripted a 5-year capital growth calculator in JS based on neighborhood-specific historical growth data.
